name: ASMR Toy
description:
Relax and enjoy a new ASMR experience with ASMR Toy. Choose from a wide variety of sounds and build your own interactive ASMR experience. From muckbangers eating to a visit to the barbershop, a calming forest, tapping, scratching, squishing and much more! If you can't find your favorite ASMR sound, don't worry! You can use your own sound clips. Not to mention all the ASMR textures around you using the ASMR Mic Toy. Brain massage and Tingles for sure! d(♥¬♥)b

Important: Some content is blocked in the mobile version, but in Desktop version all content is unlocked. 

Check out more videos in my TikTok

ASMR Toy has three ASMR toys:

Orbita Toy: create your own sound mixes! Set orbits for the sound objects around your head. Let them follow their orbit or freeze them close to your ears. Excellent to achieve the perfect atmosphere to relax, study or fall asleep. Great ASMR for Sleep!

Plane Toy: a relaxing paper airplane, which can be anything from a plane to a spaceship, which you can fly around your head, imagine being King Kong or Godzilla. The plane can be accompanied by a sound object from the library or your own sound clip.

Mic Toy: use your cell phone's microphone as a sound object inside ASMR Toy. Make it orbit around your head, or the head of your special person or friend and play with all the ASMR textures around you.
